articles.title: American influencer apologizes for snatching Australian baby wombat - CBS News
articles.description: American influencer Sam Jones said that she had picked up a wombat to try to take the animal off the road.
articles.content: An American influencer who sparked outrage after posting a video of her snatching a baby wombat from its mother while in Australia apologized on Saturday, saying she had acted out of concern for the … [+2645 chars]

articles.author: F1
articles.title: Bearman apologises to Haas for ‘messy’ weekend in Australia as woes continue with Q1 exit - Formula 1
articles.description: Haas rookie Ollie Bearman “could only apologise” to the team after his nightmare Australian Grand Prix weekend continued with a Q1 exit – describing the event as “messy” one so far.
articles.content: However, only a few minutes into that final hour of practice, Bearman lost control of his car again this time under braking for Turn 11 and ended up in the gravel trap, meaning he headed into Qualify… [+554 chars]
